title: The power of the gaze: Hypnotic Fascination with Dr. Marco Paret and his non-verbal hypnosis school
description:
Dr. Marco Paret and his students from his non-verbal hypnosis school, demonstrate the power of the gaze: Hypnotic Fascination and how it can induce many trance states. Fascination is a technique that has been used for centuries to capture someone's attention and hold it without using words. It is said to have originated in Ancient Rome and is connected to the Greek myth of Medusa, whose gaze could turn people to stone. The idea is that by using certain non-verbal techniques, you can reach and excite the most instinctual part of a person, creating a powerful bond. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
